Greg Monroe

Gregory Keith Monroe Jr. ▪ Instagram: moosemonroe15

(Moose)

Position: Center and Power Forward ▪ Shoots: Left

6-11, 265lb (211cm, 120kg)

Born: June 4, 1990 in New Orleans, Louisiana us

College: Georgetown

High School: Helen Cox in Harvey, Louisiana

Recruiting Rank: 2008 (6)

Draft: Detroit Pistons, 1st round (7th pick, 7th overall), 2010 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 30, 2010

Career Length: 10 years
